info.title: Foo API
info.description: This is a generic API definition for manipulation of {foo} resources.

get.description: Retrieve a bunch of {foo} resources. Specifiy exemple resource as body payload.

post.description: Create a new {foo} resource. Specify payload within request body.

get.description: Retrieve an already existing {foo} resource having the specified id.

404.description: No {foo} resource have the specified id.

put.description: Update an already existing {foo} resource having the specified id.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: The payload of resource {foo} to update.

200.description: Updated resource {foo} having the specified id.

delete.description: Remove an existing {foo} resource having the specified id.

204.description: Resource {foo} with specified id has been removed.
